title: Karefechi No Kanojo
alternative_title: 彼フェチの彼女 ;Kare Fetish no Kanojo ;Kare Fechi no Kanojo
status: 彼フェチの彼女 ;Kare Fetish no Kanojo ;Kare Fechi no Kanojo
description:
Description :
        What do I love about him? How long would you like the list to be?"Just by existing, I'm falling head over heels for him once again!"I love his face.His neck is beautiful. His long, slim fingers are so sexy. His bass voice is the best! Nao, this story's heroine, loves her boyfriend to death. Ren, the cool and manly boyfriend who shows his love for his girlfriend from time to time. This story revolves around their hot and heartwarming relationship.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: The Average Day Of A Close Couple
